name: Untitled Zombie Game (Toasted Gears)
description:
Untitled Zombie Game

Zombies are on the Moon and you need to clear the moon by using Star Power, if you are using too much you are losing a star in the system!

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left Mouse button or J to shoot

Mouse wheel to scroll through weapons

Gun shoots towards cursor

Created by Toasted Gears and Snakoi
